preqs: One of FIT1047, FIT1031, FIT1019, FIT1005, FIT2008 or ECE2041

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECE2041, FIT1005, FIT1019, FIT1031, FIT1047, FIT2008} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {FIT2058, FIT3018, FIT4028} and  Incompatible with course version in {1794, 2146, 3301, 3803} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT})

description: This unit will provide students with an understanding of: OSI security architecture; common information risks and requirements; operation of encryption techniques; digital signatures; public key infrastructure; authentication and non-repudiation; intrusion detection and response; firewall defence; privacy and ethics issues; security configurations to PC-based applications; and design of information systems with security compliance and security standards and protocols.
